overview:
Tommaso Di Bartolo is the founder and CEO of Cloudplace, where he provides the vision and direction for the company as it pioneers innovative ways to leverage Ecosystem Commerce Automation (ECA). As such, he is the inventor of Cloudplace. Tommaso is a frequent speaker at cloud computing industry conferences, and he is playing a major role in the adoption of ECA.

Tommaso is a serial entrepreneur over the last 10 years and prior to Cloudplace, he founded and led succesfully two companies acting in cloud computing in the role as CEO.

Tommaso Di Bartolo grew up in Sicily, Italy and went to Germany with the age of 15 where he graduated from Bavarian Academy of Advertising in Munich.

Di Bartolo had a deep-seated interest in technology so he took up a job at at Mannesmann D2, today Vodafone, where he gained his first professional ICT experience. Following, Di Bartolo was Sales Director at PSINet Germany, a global Internet Service Provider.

With the age of 21, Di Bartolo launched his first Service Startup, ROIunit, which provided IT-Vendors market access and development for the German speaking countries.

In 2004, he founded MailplusWeb one of the first Managed Service Providers for business clients in central Europe, where he grew up the company to 25 employees when he left the operations.

In 2007, Tommaso launched SaaS Distribution - as the first Distributor focused on Cloud Computing only.

For the first decade of Di Bartolo´s entrepreneurship, he self-financed all his Startups.

Today, Tommaso Di Bartolo lives with his wife and their two children in Silicon Valley. Di Bartolo is a born entrepreneur, speaks six languages and is a confirmed gourmet.

Di Bartolo´s tweets can be followed under @ToDiBa
